caption.body: The first pitch of the Giants home opener game of the season against the Kansas City Royals was thrown this afternoon at 1:35pm PDT.   United Air Lines flight attendant Sandra L. Herrmann collected autographs from notable people she met while working. One of her souvenirs was this paper (the back side of a blank airline property damage report form) signed by members of San Francisco Giantsâ€™ 1963 team. Notable names include left fielder Willie McCovey, for whom McCovey Cove is named after, and center fielder Willie Mays, who is regarded as one of the greatest players of all time.   #Giants #AvGeek #SFHistory #autograph #crewlife  souvenir autographs: United Air Lines, Sandra L. Herrmann, San Francisco Giants; 1963 Gift of Sandra Herrmann 2019.132.083  http://bit.ly/3Gpl6TJ
caption.excerpt: The first pitch of the Giants home opener game of the season against the Kansas City Royals was thrown this afternoon at 1:35pm PDT.
